爮字的基本解释

爮
páo
抓，搔。

爮字的汉语字典释义

[①]［páo］
［《篇海類編》蒲交切］
扒；搔；刨。

爮字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【爪字部】　爮； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页689第02
【字彙】蒲交切，音庖。爮刮。◎按爮字諸書皆不載，疑爲爮字之譌。然廣韻六豪搔註云：爮刮也。繹爮刮之義，當从爪，必因其爲俗用之字，故不載耳。

爮字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
爮字的起名意思

暂无。

páo
Grab, scratch.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［páo］
["Pianhai Leibian" Pu Jiaoqi]
Scratch; scratch; plan.
爮
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Collection] [Claw Character Department] 　爮; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 689 No. 02
[Vocabulary] Pu Jiao cut, sound 庖. Scrape. ◎According to the character "Cao", none of the books contains it, and it is suspected to be the "Cao" character. However, Guangyun Liuhao scratched the note: Cuan scratching also. Interpretation of the meaning of claw scraping, should be from the claw, because it is a vulgar word, so it does not carry ears.
